text:
Yep, you read that right — there will be another royal engagement coming very soon! An insider recently told E! News that Prince Harry and Suits actress Meghan Markle are “very future focused,” their relationship is in a “solid, strong place,” and the day Harry will propose to Meghan is “fast approaching!”

MORE: What Is Meghan Markle’s Real Name? Plus See More Facts About Prince Harry’s Girlfriend!

Apparently, wedding talks aren’t just happening between the couple either. “Even some of Harry’s closest aides are quietly expecting news before the end of the year,” the insider confessed. No matter the timing, it is believed that Meghan hopes to keep the engagement news private for a little while before revealing it to the entire world.

This latest romance update comes only a month after Meghan was spotted wearing a diamond ring that the redheaded royal gifted her. It was previously reported that when Harry does decide to ask Meghan to marry him, he will be proposing with a ring that once belonged to his late mother, Princess Diana. Harry’s older brother, Prince William, gave his now-wife, Kate Middleton, Diana’s 12-carat sapphire and diamond engagement ring back in 2010.

MORE: Meghan Markle’s Ex-Husband Trevor Engelson Writing $1 Million Tell-All Book About His Marriage to Prince Harry’s Girlfriend

Since Harry and Meghan began dating 13 months ago, they’ve become “total homebodies” while visiting each other in either London or Toronto. “They’ve just been chilling at home,” an insider recently dished. “There’s always someone watching or trying to get pics when they go out that they’re pretty happy just staying in and doing nothing. They like to cook, watch movies and that kind of thing.” One thing is for sure — this couple is getting serious fast, and we can’t wait to see them walk down the aisle!
